page.title: 20SURPRISE VIEW TRAILER PARK.
page.content:
Suprise view camp site is run by the Kellam's family.It is surrounded by lovely country side.The caravans are positioned on the side of a very steep hill,and the site has a fantastic view.There lots of facilities,there is a swimming pool on the site with an aqua slide which is free to campers.On the site there are sports facilties like mini golf,games area & Tennis courts.There are also childrens facilities like childrens room and playground.There is a food take away & licensed club.There is also boating on the river Trent which is 5 miles from camp.The camp houses,tents and 14 mobile homes and 260 holiday homes.
Domesday material collected and written by children in class 1 at seely church school.
